description:
A low-maintenance partner for your inflatable SUP. It breaks down into 3 pieces for travel and assembles to provide surprizing performance for the price.

  • Fibreglass shaft is strong yet light
  • Nylon blade is fibreglass filled for strength and stiffness
  • Contoured ergonomic grip for hours of comfortable paddling
  • Adjusts from 188 to 218cm
name: Cannon Paddles Boost 3-Pc Adjustable SUP Paddle
